LanguageData.AS_WHE_Cape.label: Capes (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Cape.description: A shoulder strap made of leather or cloth. Protects you from the cold and attacks.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Parka.label: Parker (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Parka.description: Hoodies made of leather or cloth. Protects you from the cold and attacks.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_SimplePoncho.label: A simple poncho (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_SimplePoncho.description: This poncho is a simple design made of leather or cloth. Not as sturdy as a parka, but very effective against the cold.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenPoncho.label: Elven Poncho (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenPoncho.description: This poncho is made with ancient elven technology. Gold patterns are woven into the poncho. It is made of very strong material and provides excellent protection. It also protects you from the cold and heat.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MarineArmor.label: Half Elf Marine Armor
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MarineArmor.description: It is a high performance armor with high strength in half-elf style.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantSuits.label: Half Elf Pressure Resistant Suit
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantSuits.descriptio: A suit that allows the wearer to operate in space. Optional armor is attached to the suit, increasing the wearer's defense.
